title: Lunar Revel discount for my main disappeared!
body:
I'd opened the Lunar Revel shop the other day to see what discounts I'd recieved, to much surprise I'd been granted a discount on one of the {{champion:222}}  skins, but upon opening it today it was replaced with an unopened discount. It's Sanguine Garen.

Rito, is this the way it's suppose to be? Can I have my other discount back? 

please delete if this is a stupid question.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to see if there is any way they can confirm that you did in fact receive that skin as one of your discounts and whether or not they can resolve the issue.
I submitted a request yesterday at 20:47, would anyone happen to know how fast their response time is if/when they respond?
